name: HEXAGUN (itch) (Munch333)
description: HEXAGUN is a game I made in 1 hour and 30 minutes as a Christmas present for my sister, I may update the game depending on whether I feel it is in need of updates. You control a hexagon and your main goal is to last as long as you can. There is no difinitive end, you just try and fight off squares for as long as you can. The game is only available on Windows operating systems.
